title: Pyramids

properties.value: There are a few pyramids found in Gielinor. These pyramids are found in the Kharidian Desert. The list of pyramids includes:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Pyramids

There are a few pyramids found in Gielinor. These pyramids are found in the Kharidian Desert. The list of pyramids includes:

Contents

  • 1 Jaldraocht Pyramid (Desert Treasure)
  • 2 Jaleustrophos Pyramid (Agility Pyramid)
  • 3 Jalsavrah Pyramid (Pyramid Plunder)
  • 4 Klenter's Pyramid

Jaldraocht Pyramid (Desert Treasure)[edit | edit source]

Main article: Jaldraocht Pyramid
  • This is Azzanadra's pyramid. It is entered at the end of Desert Treasure. It is located south of the Bandit Camp.
  • The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
    • Using a house teleport to teleport to Pollnivneach and walking south-west if the player's house portal is in Pollnivneach or simply using a Pollnivneach teleport.
    • Getting a magic carpet to the Bedabin Camp then travelling south.
    • Using the Pharaoh's sceptre to teleport there.
    • Using the Camulet to teleport to Enakhra's Temple then walk south-east.
    • Walking from the Shantay Pass. This may require taking a waterskin and desert clothing to protect yourself from desert heat.

Jaleustrophos Pyramid (Agility Pyramid)[edit | edit source]

Main article: Agility Pyramid
  • This pyramid is used for training Agility. At the top, there is a Pyramid top, which can be sold for 10,000 coins to Simon Templeton.
  • The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
    • Using the Desert amulet 2 or better to teleport to Nardah and walking south-west.
    • Getting a magic carpet straight to Pollnivneach, then going south to another heading to Nardah and then finally travelling south-west.
    • Using the Pharaoh's sceptre to teleport there.
    • Using the fairy ring system to enter one of the desert portals, and running from there. (Tip: Code dlq takes you directly north of Nardah where you can run south-west to the pyramid.)
    • Walking from the Shantay Pass. This may require taking a waterskin and desert clothing to protect yourself from desert heat.

Jalsavrah Pyramid (Pyramid Plunder)[edit | edit source]

Main article: Jalsavrah Pyramid
  • This pyramid is used to play the Pyramid Plunder game.
  • The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
    • Using the Desert amulet 2 or better to teleport to Nardah and walking south-west to either the city gates or a mound near Amascut's tent and some vultures by Agility Pyramid.
    • Getting a magic carpet straight to Pollnivneach then taking another down to Sophanem.
    • Using the Pharaoh's sceptre to teleport there.
    • Walking from Shantay Pass. This may require taking a waterskin and desert clothing to protect yourself from desert heat.

Klenter's Pyramid[edit | edit source]

Main article: Klenter's Pyramid
  • This pyramid is one of the two pyramids in Sophanem—the other being Jalsavrah, and the final resting place of Klenter. The pyramid is guarded over by a Sphinx and can only be accessed with a cat.
  • The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
    • Using the Desert amulet 2 or better to teleport to Nardah and walking south-west to either the city gates or a mound near Amascut's tent and some vultures by Agility Pyramid.
    • Getting a magic carpet straight to Pollnivneach then taking another down to Sophanem.
    • Using the Pharaoh's sceptre to teleport to Jalsavrah Pyramid and walking a bit southwards.
    • Walking from Shantay Pass. This may require taking a waterskin and desert clothing to protect yourself from desert heat.

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
There are a few '''pyramids''' found in [[Gielinor]]. These pyramids are found in the [[Kharidian Desert]]. The list of pyramids includes:

== Jaldraocht Pyramid (Desert Treasure) ==
{{main|Jaldraocht Pyramid}}
*This is [[Azzanadra]]'s [[Jaldraocht Pyramid|pyramid]]. It is entered at the end of [[Desert Treasure]]. It is located south of the [[Bandit Camp (Kharidian Desert)|Bandit Camp]].
*The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
**Using a [[house teleport]] to teleport to [[Pollnivneach]] and walking south-west if the player's house portal is in Pollnivneach or simply using a [[Pollnivneach teleport]].
**Getting a [[magic carpet]] to the [[Bedabin Camp]] then travelling south.
**Using the [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] to teleport there.
**Using the [[Camulet]] to teleport to [[Enakhra's Temple]] then walk south-east.
**Walking from the [[Shantay Pass]]. This may require taking a [[waterskin]] and [[desert clothing]] to protect yourself from [[desert heat]].

== Jaleustrophos Pyramid (Agility Pyramid) ==
{{main|Agility Pyramid}}
*This [[Agility Pyramid|pyramid]] is used for training [[Agility]]. At the top, there is a [[Pyramid top]], which can be sold for 10,000 coins to [[Simon Templeton]].
*The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
**Using the [[Desert amulet 2]] or better to teleport to [[Nardah]] and walking south-west.
**Getting a [[magic carpet]] straight to [[Pollnivneach]], then going south to another heading to Nardah and then finally travelling south-west.
**Using the [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] to teleport there.
**Using the [[fairy ring]] system to enter one of the desert portals, and running from there. ('''Tip:''' Code {{fairycode|dlq}} takes you directly north of Nardah where you can run south-west to the pyramid.)
**Walking from the [[Shantay Pass]]. This may require taking a [[waterskin]] and [[desert clothing]] to protect yourself from [[desert heat]].

== Jalsavrah Pyramid (Pyramid Plunder) ==
{{main|Jalsavrah Pyramid}}
*This [[Jalsavrah Pyramid|pyramid]] is used to play the [[Pyramid Plunder]] game.
*The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
**Using the [[Desert amulet 2]] or better to teleport to [[Nardah]] and walking south-west to either the city gates or a mound near [[Amascut]]'s tent and some [[vulture]]s by [[Agility Pyramid]].
**Getting a [[magic carpet]] straight to [[Pollnivneach]] then taking another down to [[Sophanem]].
**Using the [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] to teleport there.
**Walking from [[Shantay Pass]]. This may require taking a [[waterskin]] and [[desert clothing]] to protect yourself from [[desert heat]].

==Klenter's Pyramid==
{{main|Klenter's Pyramid}}
*This [[Klenter's Pyramid|pyramid]] is one of the two pyramids in [[Sophanem]]—the other being [[Jalsavrah]], and the final resting place of [[Klenter]]. The pyramid is guarded over by a [[Sphinx]] and can only be accessed with a [[cat]].
*The best ways to get to this pyramid are:
**Using the [[Desert amulet 2]] or better to teleport to [[Nardah]] and walking south-west to either the city gates or a mound near [[Amascut]]'s tent and some [[vulture]]s by [[Agility Pyramid]].
**Getting a [[magic carpet]] straight to [[Pollnivneach]] then taking another down to [[Sophanem]].
**Using the [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] to teleport to [[Jalsavrah Pyramid]] and walking a bit southwards.
**Walking from [[Shantay Pass]]. This may require taking a [[waterskin]] and [[desert clothing]] to protect yourself from [[desert heat]].
